name: Build Test App

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

    paths:
    - 'Dockerfile'
    - '*.csproj'
    - '**.cs'
    - 'autogitops/**'
    - '.github/workflows/build.yaml'

jobs:

  build:

    runs-on: ubuntu-20.04
    env:
      DOCKER_REPO: ghcr.io/retaildevcrews/csapp

    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v2

    - name: Login to Container Registry
      uses: docker/login-action@v1
      with:
        registry: ghcr.io
        username: ${{ secrets.GHCR_ID }}
        password: ${{ secrets.GHCR_PAT }}

    - name: Install dotnet 6 (temporary)
      run: |
        # this is temporary until the runners have dotnet 6
        sudo apt-get install -y dotnet-sdk-6.0

    - name: Docker pull
      run: |
        docker pull mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:6.0
        docker pull mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/aspnet:6.0-alpine

    - name: Docker Build
      run: |
        docker build . --progress auto -t image

    - name: Docker Tag and Push
      run: |
        VERSION=$(docker run --rm image --version)
        # tag the repo with :latest
        docker tag image $DOCKER_REPO:beta
        # Push to the repo
        docker push -a $DOCKER_REPO

    - name: Docker pull
      run: |
        docker pull ghcr.io/bartr/autogitops:beta

    - name: GitOps Deploy
      run: |
        docker run \
        --name ago \
        --rm \
        -v $(pwd):/ago \
        ghcr.io/bartr/autogitops:beta \
        -r retaildevcrews/edge-gitops \
        -b pilot \
        -p ${{ secrets.GHCR_PAT }}
